professional_summary: Data Enthusiast certified in Oracle Database Administration with 5 years of work and academic experience transforming data into actionable information and supporting mission-critical databases.

work_experience.company: Living Spring Home Health Care Inc.
key_responsibilities: Manage and modify information systems to improve workflow.
Design financial and administrative reports with data visualization.
Analyze data for trends impacting quality of service or improper payments.
Make data-driven recommendations for claims processing efficiency.
and manage Oracle 11gR2/12c RAC and single instance databases.
Manage backup and recovery using RMAN on Red Hat Linux.
Create and implement backup plans with cold/hot backups and RMAN.
Troubleshoot database issues and automate tasks using SQL and UNIX shell scripting.
and maintain Oracle database objects and storage structures.
Run complex queries and analyze data using R and SQL.
Address data quality issues and improve reporting processes.
Collaborate with IT and other stakeholders to deliver projects.
